casebody.data:
Kirk Charles HERALD, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
Laurie Marie ROZEK, Defendant/Counterplaintiff-Appellant. SC: 158880
COA: 339530 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 5, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the September 11, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
